article.title: Air Force Laboratory Awards Research Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: University of Dayton Research Institute, Dayton, Ohio, is being awarded a $42 million indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity cost reimbursable contract to perform on-site research activities at the Air Force Research Laboratory to include analyses, development, experimentation, and reporting.Â The location of the performance is Air Force Research Laboratory, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio. The contracting activity is Wright-Patterson, Air Force Base.
